item.description:
What:
Campaign Kickoff and Barbecue For State Representative Candidate Dave Mincin

Where:
The home of Honey & Todd Puterbaugh
68 Beauty Hill Road
Barrington, NH

When:
Noon to 4:00 PM, Saturday September 20, 2008

Join us in showing our support for Dave and his bid to represent the residents of Barrington, Strafford, Farmington, Milton, New Durham, and Middleton at the State House in Concord.

Food, entertainment, and a few inspiring words from The Candidate himself will be provided at this family-friendly event.

Dave is a proponent of limited government, and personal freedom and responsibility. If you share these values, and want to see them be the guiding principles of the New Hampshire state government, then please attend this event and lend Dave your support.

If you plan on attending, please RSVP by Wednesday September 17 to RSVP@Mincin.org or by phone at 603-280-4708.

To learn more about Dav, his campaign, and what you can do to support his run for office, please visit www.mincin.org.

Thanks,
Honey Puterbaugh
item.name: Campaign Kickoff and Barbecue For State Representative Candidate Dave Mincin
